message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.

Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate you being willing to negotiate.  I'm really interested in the product, but $100 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with right now.  Would you be willing to come down to $90?
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand your concerns, but I'm still a bit above my minimum price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $95.
